name: RoVR
description:
You walk into a park and notice a cardboard box with the words "Free Puppies" scrawled onto its side. You walk over, look in, and your heart stops. The most beautiful, loving brown eyes you have ever seen stare back at you...

Play fetch in your backyard, watch your dog run around in a dinosaur costume, train your dog to roll over or give your dog treats and pets and tummy rubs all day long! With RoVR, you will be able to raise your very own VR dog – just like a real dog, the more treats, pets and love you give your VR dog, the more he will love you each day. Make sure to feed and bathe your dog too or he might just get mad at you and even refuse to play!

The world of RoVR presents a detailed, natural landscape studded with parks and towns for you to explore with your VR dog. Meet NPCs and their dogs, watch the birds fly over head, the trees bending ever so slightly in the wind, the ripples across the lake or explore the shops filled with toys and treats and prizes.

With VR, RoVR combines incredibly immersive technology with an extremely advanced AI to create an experience like you've never felt before. Teach your dog to do tricks in response to custom hand gestures and phrases, train it to compete in agility competitions to test your dog's obedience and athleticism. Feel your heart swell as your VR dog showers you with love for being such a kind owner.

Get ready to experience RoVR: a VR pet simulator.
